titleInfo.title: Essays on the Effects of Migration and Demographic Factors on Labor Markets and Human Capital Accumulation

mods.abstract: This thesis has been written within the European Doctorate in Economics – Erasmus Mundus (EDEEM), with the purpose to obtain a Doctorate in economics at the Bielefeld Graduate School of Economics and Management, Bielefeld University, Germany and at the Institute of Economic and Social Research, Université Catholique de Louvain, Belgium.
